name: Raw Garnet
description: Garnet is a richly colored gemstone, often deep red, used in jewelry for its durability and vibrant hue.

name: Raw Amethyst
description: An amethyst gemstone is a purple variety of quartz that is prized for its beauty and is often used in jewelry.

name: Raw Aquamarine
description: Aquamarine is a blue to greenish-blue gemstone, in the beryl family, valued for its clarity and ocean-like colors

name: Raw Diamond
description: A diamond is a durable, brilliant carbon gemstone known for unmatched hardness and clarity.

name: Raw Emerald
description: An emerald is a vibrant green gemstone from the beryl family, prized for its rich color and rarity.

name: Raw Ruby
description: A ruby is a vibrant red gemstone valued for its hardness and rich color, making it highly coveted for jewelry.

name: Garnet Necklace
description: This is a necklace with a heart-shaped garnet pendant on a gold chain, accented with crystals.

name: Garnet Tennis Bracelet
description: This bracelet features a single row of round, deep red garnet stones set in a classic sterling silver tennis design.

name: Aquamarine Pendant
description: This necklace features a heart-shaped aquamarine pendant in a silver infinity symbol with tiny crystals.

name: Aquamarine Ring
description: This wedding ring showcases seven round-cut aquamarine stones set in a sleek silver band.

name: Amethyst Necklace
description: This necklace has a polished amethyst pendant in a rose gold band with crystals on a matching chain.

name: Amethyst Earrings
description: These earrings have pear-shaped amethysts in a silver frame with crystals and smooth loops.

name: Diamond Pendant
description: This necklace features a heart-shaped diamond pendant on a delicate silver chain.

name: Diamond Ring
description: This wedding ring features a circle of large, round-cut diamonds set in a polished white gold band.

name: Emerald Pendant
description: This pendant features a gold olive branch design with marquise-cut emerald leaves.

name: Emerald Ring
description: This ring showcases a vibrant oval-cut emerald gemstone set in a simple yet elegant gold band.
